# News & Announcements

#### Vivakor gives tech investors exposure to tomorrow’s roads, using today’s waste

Mar 11, 2022

##### Building the roads of tomorrow, using the waste of today. That’s one of the propositions that drew investors to [Vivakor (NASDAQ:VIVK)](https://www.proactiveinvestors.com/NASDAQ:VIVK/Vivakor/)’s February 2022 listing on the tech-heavy NASDAQ exchange, attracting $8 million in new investment…

##### [Read More >>](https://www.proactiveinvestors.com/companies/news/976452/vivakor-gives-tech-investors-exposure-to-tomorrow-s-roads-using-today-s-waste-976452.html)

#### Vivakor Shares Rise 11% After New Lease, Services Deals

Mar 10, 2022

##### Vivakor Inc. shares were up 11% to $2.90 after the company said it signed a lease with Tar Sands Holdings II LLC and an agreement with Greenfield Energy LLC, which together are expected to provide Vivakor with multiple years of rich oil sands supply, along with access to world class operational services…

##### [Read More >>](https://www.marketwatch.com/story/vivakor-shares-rise-11-after-new-lease-services-deals-271646927770)

#### Vivakor Secures Long Term Oil Sands Supply & Lease Agreement at its Utah Facility

Mar 10, 2022

##### Vivakor (NASDAQ:VIVK) Inc CEO Matt Nicosia tells Proactive it has signed a lease with Tar Sands Holdings II (TSHII) and an agreement with Greenfield Energy, which, together, are expected to provide it with multiple years of rich oil sands supply, along with access to world-class operational services…

Proactive Investors Link: **[Read More>>](https://www.proactiveinvestors.com/companies/news/976464/vivakor-secures-long-term-oil-sands-supply-and-lease-agreement-at-its-utah-facility-976464.html)**

Yahoo Finance Link: **[Read More>>](https://finance.yahoo.com/news/vivakor-secures-long-term-oil-133000062.html)**

Seeking Alpha Link: **[Read More>>](https://seekingalpha.com/news/3812156-vivakor-signs-long-term-oil-sands-supply-lease-agreement-at-utah-facility)**

Street Insider Link: **[Read More>>](https://www.streetinsider.com/Corporate+News/Vivakor%2C+Inc.+%28VIVK%29+Secures+Long+Term+Oil+Sands+Supply+%26+Lease+Agreement+at+its+Utah+Facility/19756049.html)**

#### TomCo Energy’s Greenfield enters MoU with cleantech provider Vivakor

Mar 10, 2022

##### TomCo Energy PLC – oil explorer in Utah – Signs memorandum of understanding of Vivakor Inc over a professional services agreement for the supply of engineering services, including sand treatment and oil upscaling on the Tar Sands Holdings II LLC site in the Uinta basin in Utah. Also entered a renewed lease covering three acres of land for a term of five years, and an option to extend for a further five…

Vox Markets Link: **[Read More>>](https://www.voxmarkets.co.uk/articles/tomco-energy-s-greenfield-enters-mou-with-cleantech-provider-vivakor-e4d756c/)**

Morning Star Link: **[Read More>>](https://www.morningstar.co.uk/uk/news/AN_1646947346060091600/in-brief-tomco-energy-signs-deal-with-vivakor-over-uinta-basin.aspx)**

#### Cleantech Vivakor stock shoots up 20% but still trading 22% below IPO price

Mar 8, 2022

##### Cleantech provider Vivakor (NASDAQ:[VIVK](https://seekingalpha.com/symbol/VIVK?source=content_type%3Areact%7Csection%3Amain_content%7Cbutton%3Abody_link%7Cfirst_level_url%3Anews "Vivakor, Inc.")) stock shot up 20% in morning action Tuesday, but is still trading 22% below its initial public offering price. Shares last changed hands at $3.90 at approximately 11:00 a.m. ET after opening at $3.76 and hitting a high of $4.20…

##### [Read More >>](https://seekingalpha.com/news/3810702-cleantech-vivakor-stock-soars-but-still-trading-below-ipo-price)

#### Vivakor, Inc. announces pricing of public offering and NASDAQ listing

Feb 15, 2022

##### South Salt Lake — Vivakor, Inc. (the “Company” or “Vivakor”) (NASDAQ:VIVK), a socially responsible operator, acquirer, and developer of clean energy technologies and environmental solutions, today announced the pricing of its underwritten public offering of 1,600,000 shares of common stock (the “Common Stock”) at a public…

##### Read More >>
